messages.message: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
messages.author: Winston Churchill

messages.message: Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does.
messages.author: William James

messages.message: What you get by achieving your goals is not as important as what you become by achieving your goals.
messages.author: Zig Ziglar

messages.message: Believe in yourself and all that you are. Know that there is something inside you that is greater than any obstacle.
messages.author: Christian D. Larson

messages.message: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
messages.author: C.S. Lewis

messages.message: Try to be a rainbow in someone's cloud.
messages.author: Maya Angelou

messages.message: Keep your face always toward the sunshine—and shadows will fall behind you.
messages.author: Walt Whitman

messages.message: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow is our doubts of today.
messages.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

messages.message: Do not wait for the perfect moment, take the moment and make it perfect.
messages.author: Zoey Sayward

messages.message: You miss 100% of the shots you don’t take.
messages.author: Wayne Gretzky

messages.message: The best way to predict the future is to create it.
messages.author: Peter Drucker

messages.message: In the middle of every difficulty lies opportunity.
messages.author: Albert Einstein

messages.message: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
messages.author: Steve Jobs

messages.message: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
messages.author: Sam Levenson

messages.message: Success is how high you bounce when you hit bottom.
messages.author: George S. Patton

messages.message: Hardships often prepare ordinary people for an extraordinary destiny.
messages.author: C.S. Lewis

messages.message: You can’t go back and change the beginning, but you can start where you are and change the ending.
messages.author: James Sherman

messages.message: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
messages.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

messages.message: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
messages.author: Confucius

messages.message: You are capable of more than you know.
messages.author: Glinda, 'Wicked'

messages.message: Don't be pushed around by the fears in your mind. Be led by the dreams in your heart.
messages.author: Roy T. Bennett

messages.message: You don’t have to see the whole staircase, just take the first step.
messages.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

messages.message: Go confidently in the direction of your dreams. Live the life you have imagined.
messages.author: Henry David Thoreau

messages.message: The only person you should try to be better than is the person you were yesterday.
messages.author: Matty Mullins

messages.message: You are the artist of your own life. Don’t hand the paintbrush to anyone else.
messages.author: Unknown

messages.message: Small steps in the right direction can turn out to be the biggest step of your life.
messages.author: Naeem Callaway

messages.message: You are stronger than you think and braver than you believe.
messages.author: Unknown

messages.message: Every day may not be good, but there is something good in every day.
messages.author: Alice Morse Earle

messages.message: The struggle you’re in today is developing the strength you need for tomorrow.
messages.author: Robert Tew
